transcript: a big part of why I'm here today when I lost everything she was with me we were dating and so that was in the first 9 months of us dating this guy she met had sold all his gyms starting this new business it's doing well to then losing all of it in that first 9-month period so she was with me through thick and thin and it was really because of her and a lot of her support that I was able to make it through that and she just tirelessly worked with me both of us not making anything to make the next thing work which was gym launch
